text: Musavin camukattar avar (cenra) pin tankal nakaikalaik kontu oru kalaik kanrin cilaiyai(c ceytu atait teyvamaka) akkik kontarkal; atarku (mattin captattaip pol verum) captamiruntatu niccayamaka atu avarkalitam pecavum mattatu, innum avarkalukku (ner) vali kattavum ceyyatu enpatai avarkal kavanittirukka ventama, avarkal atanaiye (teyvamaka) akkik kontarkal - innum avarkal (tamakkut tame) aniyayam ceytu kontarkal
